mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(subject, content, writer) values (#{subject}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update tbl_board set subject = #{subject}, content = #{content} where board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.select: select board_id As boardId, subject, content, writer, register_date As registerDate, hit from tbl_board where board_id > 0 order by board_id desc, register_date desc
select board_id As boardId, subject, content, writer, register_date As registerDate, hit from tbl_board where board_id > 0 order by board_id desc, register_date desc limit #{page}, 10
select board_id As boardId, subject, content, writer, register_date As registerDate, hit from tbl_board where board_id > 0 order by board_id desc, register_date desc limit #{startPage}, #{numPerPage}
